name: A Tower Defense
description:
The enemies attack the castle of your king ! You have to defend it, but something will make this task harder...

How to play ?

You can equip your turret with  4 differents weapons. The basic one do great damage on a single target, the snipe weapon have a great range but slow fire rate, the freeze weapon can freeze enemies movement, and the laser weapon do great aoe damage.

Control :

wasd or arrow keys to move the turret. Press 1,2,3,4 to change your weapon and alt+1,2,3,4 to buy/upgrade weapons.

This game was made by Celso Rodrigues, Loïs Monet and Dany Brégeon in 48 hours for the GMTK game jam. We try to make the maximum by ourselves, but because of the lack of time we use some external free sprites find on opengameart.org and a music :
